title: aria-placeholder test
description: A suite of tests for aria-placeholder

chrome.output: "M M dash D D dash Y Y Y Y, edit"
"My birthday, edit, M M dash D D dash Y Y Y Y, type in text"
"Your birthday" is said before entering text field on next down arrow press
"M M dash D D dash Y Y Y Y, edit"
"His birthday, edit, M M dash D D dash Y Y Y Y"

edge.output: "input left bracket type equals text right bracket aria placeholder defined unlabelled, edit, type in text"

edge.notes: Doesn't announce html placeholder nor aria-placeholder
Doesn't announce html placeholder nor aria-placeholder

firefox.notes: Doesn't announce html placeholder nor aria-placeholder

chrome.output: "My birthday, edit, M M D D Y Y Y Y"
"My birthday, edit, M M D D Y Y Y Y, blank"
"His birthday, edit, M M D D Y Y Y Y"
"His birthday, edit, M M D D Y Y Y Y, blank"

edge.output: "My birthday, edit, M M D D Y Y Y Y"
"My birthday, edit, M M D D Y Y Y Y, blank"

firefox.output: "clickable, My birthday, edit, has autocomplete, M M D D Y Y Y Y"
"My birthday, edit, has autocomplete, M M D D Y Y Y Y, blank"
"His birthday, edit, has autocomplete, M M D D Y Y Y Y, blank"

edge.notes: Doesn't announce html placeholder nor aria-placeholder
Doesn't announce html placeholder nor aria-placeholder

and_chr.output: "edit box, My birthday, M M D D Y Y Y Y"
"Edit box, His birthday, M M D D Y Y Y Y"
"December 25th 2000, Edit box, Her birthday, M M D D Y Y Y Y"

"His birthday, M M D D Y Y Y Y, Text field"

"His birthday, M M D D Y Y Y Y, edit text"
"His birthday, M M D D Y Y Y Y, edit text"
